metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4456 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ownCloud Desktop Client before 1.8.2 does not call QNetworkReply::ignoreSslErrors with the list of errors to be ignored, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to bypass the user's certificate distrust decision and obtain sensitive information by leveraging a self-signed certificate and a connection to a server using its own self-signed certificate.

criterions.comment: owncloud-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
